attributes.action: For a General Election to be called on the basis of the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: The future shaping of our country and the environment in which we voted has changed entirely and so a new direction must be voted in by it's people.
attributes.background: The reason many of us voted to leave the EU was to bring back the democratic process to the UK, with David Cameron resigning we should not now allow an unelected PM to take his place who we have no say over how they choose to shape the country.
